Projects Online Demo

Projects

Understanding the Real World with Rigororos Data-Driven Models and Complex Network Analysis

Read More

Cascade Faults and Robustness of Complex System

Based on complex system theory, nonlinear dynamics and data-driven AI, to present a new approach to analyze, predict and improve the robustness of power grid.

Power System Stability Prediction and Control based on AI

With the help of AI, to realize quick and accurate transient stability prediction and low frequency oscillation suppression of power system.

Technical Regulation of Vehicle Network Interaction based on Deep Reinforcement Learning

Combined with DRL technology, to realize economic and security dispatching of power system by hierarchical approaches.

Battery Status Prediction and Battery System Management

To make solar and wind more reliable and predicable and realize the oversight of BMS.

Prediction of Complex System/Machine Remaining Useful Life

With RUL prediction, to capture fault information more quickly and provide timely failure warning.

Wind Turbine Fault Prediction and Diagnosis based on AI

To realize fault diagnosis, state classification and fault prediction of wind turbine.

Wind Power Generator Failure Simulation

Real-time monitoring of the fan running status and predicting the upcoming failure in advance, to reduce the maintenance cost of wind turbine.

Design and Optimization of Metamaterial Lens

By cell-based optimization, to improve the accuracy of wavefront modulation for each subwavelength nanocell and reduce aberrations.
